item.title: Adding a new Object

item.description:

so i added a new object this is the code i have if (i == 417) { class46.name = "Resting Post"; class46.description = "You Can Rest Here".getBytes(); class46.anInt744 = 1; class46.anInt761 = 1; class46.anIntArray773 = new int[1]; class46.anIntArray773[0] = 50099; class46.itemActions = new String[5]; class46.itemActions[0] = "Rest"; class46.hasActions = true; class46.aBoolean767 = false; class46.aBoolean762 = false; class46.aBoolean769 = false; }

so when i go to get the action id so i can make it do something nothing comes up on my sever side cmd and the number 3 comes up on the client side what have i done rong
